The Bride and Groom

Sydnee

I was born in Great Falls, Montana. Moved around a little bit when I was younger to New Mexico and Florida and landed back here in Montana when I was going into 4th grade. I was involved in sports like volleyball, basketball, cheerleading, and many other extracurricular activities. I graduated high school at Centerville in 2016 and went to college for a year as I had gotten a cheerleading scholarship with the University of Great Falls (University of Providence). I was hoping that as I continued to be in college while cheerleading that my dream occupation would expose itself, but nothing sounded good to me. I stopped going to college and worked at various jobs, from a grocery store, to a dog boarding facility, to landscaping, to finally landing in the Great Falls Clinic, which is where I have been working for the past year and a half. I also started selling Scentsy in December of 2020 which has been an amazing experience. Some of my hobbies include camping, hiking, traveling, and being around any and all dogs.

Jake

I was born in Bozeman, Montana and moved to Great Falls when I was about 1 year old. I went to public school until 4th grade and then homeschooled from then until I graduated high school. I graduated Class of 2014 from Christian Liberty Academy out of Illinois. I did many programs in 4-H as long as I can remember. Dog, archery, and Junior Leader camps were my jam in 4-H. I also helped when needed at livestock shows and sales. My first job was boarding K9 drug detective dogs for a family friend and slowly moved to lawn mowing and plumbing during the summer. I landed a sweet job at FedEx Ground in 2014 where I worked my way up to manager. I have been in Montana all my life and proud to call it my home. I currently enjoy working on my '78 Chevy truck, camping/hiking, backroading, and bonfires with friends.
